name: Joana's Guide
body:
Current Version: 1.8


###Joana's Guide Atlas Suite

Posted Image


###ABOUT

Joana's Guide Atlas Suite Is a 1-60 Horde leveling guide addon built into atlas.

It is using Joana's guide 1.28


###DOWNLOAD

[Click Here](https://github.com/Doctorbeefy/JoanasGuide1/blob/master/joanas%20guide.zip?raw=true)



###SOURCE CODE

https://github.com/Doctorbeefy/JoanasGuide1

###PROGRESS

```
--1 - 60 Horde
--1 - 30 Alliance
-- Removed a few BC quests
-- Added a few notes on full quest logs
-- Added SM run
-- Added a few Hearths
-- Updated Font
```

###COMING SOON
```
-- 30-60(Alliance)
-- Atlas Quest Intergration
-- Fix overlapping Text
-- Finish Alliance Guide
```

CONTACT ME
```
Send In game mail to Bennylava In Game.
Bennylavaed@gmail.com
Private Message Me
for any fixes, errors, suggestions, bugged quests or donations
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
